titles.title: To provide for a study relating to the feasibility of using postal employees as census enumerators.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

bill.summary: 7/29/2009--Introduced. Directs the United States Postal Service to study and report to the appropriate congressional committees by January 1, 2012, on the feasibility of using postal employees to serve as enumerators in the 2020 decennial census.
